results.title: New Star of ‘The Prom’ Sees a Chance to Make L.G.B.T.Q. Characters Visible
results.abstract: Like her character, Jo Ellen Pellman identifies as queer, and she is making her film debut in the Netflix musical alongside A-listers like Meryl Streep and Nicole Kidman.

results.title: Trading Box Office for Streaming, but Stars Still Want Their Money

multimedia.caption: The actress Gal Gadot received more than $10 million from Warner Bros. after the studio decided “Wonder Woman 1984” would not have a traditional theater release.

results.abstract: If studios are no longer trying to maximize ticket sales, what will that mean for often lucrative pay packages tied to a film’s performance in theaters?
